headline: UPDATE: J.D. Vance responds to Trump’s endorsement
author: DML News App
sentences:
I think frankly if we were 20 points behind we probably still win, but we’re going to win this thing now,” he said, speaking of how he will ultimately win the general election as well and bring a “different perspective to the Senate.”
Vance also clarified his lack of support for Trump at first, telling Breitbart that the attempts by the swamp and establishment to destroy the president is what changed his mind.

While Vance said the campaign is going “very well,” he said the race is “definitely tight.” However, the Trump endorsement serves as an “incredible boost for us coming down the stretch.”
The article goes on to state the following:
“So I felt confident before we got the endorsement.

Vance, who secured former President Donald Trump’s endorsement for U.S. Senate in Ohio on Friday, walked through why he believes Trump is backing him in the tight race, telling Breitbart News Saturday that Trump knows Vance will carry on the America First agenda.

LISTEN:
“This is not an easy endorsement for me to make because I like and respect some of the other candidates in the race — they’ve said great things about “Trump” and, like me, they love Ohio and love our Country,” Trump said in his endorsement of Vance.

He’s strong on the Border, tough on Crime, understands how to use Taxes and Tariffs to hold China accountable, will fight to break up Big Tech, and has been a warrior on the Rigged and Stolen Presidential Election.
Calling the endorsement “hugely important and powerful,” Vance gave Trump great credit for getting involved in the primary races and openly supporting those he believes will benefit the country.
